statements: DELETE FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE supplier_id = 1000 AND quality_rating > 4.5;
DELETE FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE pricing_agreement < 100 AND delivery_time < 3;
DELETE FROM performance_evaluations WHERE supplier_id = 123 AND evaluation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM supplier_metrics WHERE quality_rating < 3 AND price_agreement > 0.8;
DELETE FROM supplier_delivery_metrics WHERE late_deliveries > 5 AND on_time_deliveries < 10;
DELETE FROM quality_metrics WHERE supplier_rating >= 4.5 AND metric_name = 'Quality Score';
